entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High 9.
